answerText: abyssal plains[10] This region of the ocean is located, in vast contrast to abyssal plains, at the very surface of the ocean, and represents the boundary between the ocean and atmosphere.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Harvard  | 8 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Answer the following about the vast oceans, for ten points each: [10] This is the name for the vast flat expanses of the ocean floor, where benthic organisms often live.
